opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we improve the navigation experience between the event calendar and list view?
opportunities.evidence: Each time I want to go back to the calendar of events after clicking on an event, it goes back to the beginning of many months ago. It doesn't start where I just left off.
opportunities.user_need: Users need a seamless navigation experience when browsing events to save time and frustration.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we provide clearer access to contact information for members?
opportunities.evidence: I did look once because I was trying to find someone's phone number, I think, but that was probably two years ago. So I don't remember.
opportunities.user_need: Users require easy access to members' contact information for better communication.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we create a dedicated alumni section on the website?
opportunities.evidence: I would love to know if there will be listing alumni events that I can click on and look for or how I find out about those when we graduate.
opportunities.user_need: Alumni need a way to stay connected and informed about events and opportunities after graduation.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we enhance the visual appeal of the website to make it more inviting?
opportunities.evidence: I think the visual in our website needs can use some small thing up a bit... it needs to be prettied up a little bit just to be more attractive.
opportunities.user_need: Users desire a more aesthetically pleasing website that encourages engagement.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we simplify the process of signing up for events?
opportunities.evidence: The job form is a nightmare for most.
opportunities.user_need: Users need an easier process to sign up for events without technical difficulties.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we ensure that users can easily find and access important governing documents?
opportunities.evidence: It's not always clear where that stuff is... it’s you need to kind of search those out.
opportunities.user_need: Users need straightforward access to important documents and information.
